Subjects: God, hymns to; hymns, to God
_description: ‘Salvum fac regem domine’ — thirteen 8-line stanzas with this refrain

Lam344.First Lines:
Kyryeleyson KristeleysonPater de celys deus to the we crye
                    …
Lam344.Last Lines:
…Devoutly seyth all that ben hereSaluum fac regem
                    domine
Lam344.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 196-200.
